basics.name: Michael Jereme Hancock
basics.headline: I'm just a guy who likes to tinker.

highlights: UI development for customer facing control panels
Full stack development in a fast paced organization
Perform QE/QA tasks for a variety of projects
Managed the development of the Cloud Sites Control Panel
Worked closely with Engineering and System Operations
Ensured continuous product improvements

Troubleshot complex issues in a load balanced, clustered hosting environment
Handled various levels of customer escalations
